channel.title: ATI or Nvidia?
channel.description: ok, ive been wondering..is ATI the way to go or is Nvidia? ive heard that Nvidia's New GPU the 8800 GTX is really something and yet ive head ATI 's GPUS are "ahead of its time" id appreciate the help for im currently looking to buying a new gpu my old ATI GPU is kinda..worn out i.e doesnt really give a lot of "umph" compared to the new ones out there and kinda wanting to go to Nviidia...yet ive been a ATI fan for a long time..help would be appreciated..thanks

item.title: ATI or Nvidia?
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

Uh, actually mopar, at one time ATI was much better (not anymore).

item.title: ATI or Nvidia?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Nvidia always has been, is, and ever shall be greater than ATI.

That may be an exaggeration as I can’t see into the future, but nvidia is definitely the best choice now.

Read full topic
